title: Mental health awareness is on the rise – when will the money world stop dragging its feet?
text:
What better evidence could there be that more money does not always lead to more happiness than this week’s public spat between footballers’ wives Coleen Rooney and Rebekah Vardy?

Mrs Rooney spent months on a covert operation in an attempt to prove that stories about her were leaked to the press via an Instagram account belonging to none other than Mrs Vardy – a denouement she revealed in a social media post so gripping it earned her the nickname “Wagatha Christie”.

What it shows is that wealth is no harbinger of happiness; indeed, money can often be a source of strife.

It’s easy for us to cast aspersions on our peers based on our assumptions of their wealth and therefore ease of life. This couple...
